PORT = 8000
NODE_ENV = production
DB_LOCAL_URI= mongodb://mongo:27017/plantshop
JWT_SECRET=
JWT_EXPIRES_TIME=7d
COOKIE_EXPIRES_TIME=7

SMTP_PORT=2525

SMTP_PASS=

SMTP_FROM_EMAIL=noreply@plantshop.com

FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:3000
